title: I just bought the Google Pixel 4a5g and i was surprised that the selfie camera is yellowish Help!
content:
I just bought the Google Pixel 4a 5g ..the device is so perfect except for the selfie cam..it is saturated with yellow tint ..on some apps like watsapp and messanger it is horrible...and moreover I get an app error when I try to change the ring tone ...my CP is updated 
I wanna know if it is a software problem
